title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Live Case-Based Strategic and Reflective Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental strategic concepts and social science theories
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify core issues in given live cases and derive three or more solutions using critical thinking frameworks
Through reflective journaling, learners can systematically document decision-making processes and suggest two or more improvements based on peer feedback
Learners can develop one or more optimal decision-making models reflecting real-industry constraints using strategic simulation tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
